files.patch:
@@ -350,1 +350,5 @@
-    if (reserved_rgn->same_region(base_addr, size)) {
+    // Deal with recursive reservation
+    // os::reserve_memory() -> pd_reserve_memory() -> os::reserve_memory()
+    // See JDK-8198226.
+    if (reserved_rgn->same_region(base_addr, size) &&
+        reserved_rgn->flag() == flag) {
